L

levelCanvas - Variable in class com.snake.LevelController
The canvas on which the game's sprites are drawn
LevelController - Class in com.snake
Based on MyFrame and Play - Controls the display of levels as well as their component sprites (snake, fruit, walls) and JavaFX controls, handles user input to snake via KeyListeners.
LevelController() - Constructor for class com.snake.LevelController
 
loadL2() - Method in class com.snake.LevelController
Switches level to level two, colour theme depending on user setting loaded from GameModel
loadL3() - Method in class com.snake.LevelController
Switches level to level three, colour theme depending on user setting loaded from GameModel
longFlag - Variable in class com.snake.GameModel
Stores whether the user has asked for an extended game - default is false
longGameCB - Variable in class com.snake.SettingsController
Sets game to be long (126 points for full game)
LongStorage - Class in com.snake
Stores a long value - required for display loop to work as normal long is not final or semi-final - used for inter-frame time calculation
LongStorage(long) - Constructor for class com.snake.LongStorage
Sets stored long.
